text: int main ( ) { int t , r , j , i , a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] , sum ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t > 0 ) { sum = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & r ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < r ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } sum = a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ; i = 0 ; j = 0 ; while ( i < r ) { if ( a [ i + 1 ] [ j ] >= a [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] ) { sum = sum + a [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] ; i = i + 1 ; j = j + 1 ; } else { sum = sum + a [ i + 1 ] [ j ] ; i = i + 1 ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , sum ) ; t -- ; } }
